mil1:7.2: nihatapaccatthikaṃ → nihatapaccatthika (bj, pts-vp-pli1); nīhata (maku); nippaccatthikaṃ (mr) | varapavaragopuratoraṇaṃ → pavarapacuragopuratoraṇaṃ (bj)
mil1:7.3: vividhadānaggasatasamupasobhitaṃ → satatamupasobhitaṃ (mr) | vividhasamaṇabrāhmaṇasabhājanasaṅghaṭitaṃ → … sammābhājana … (mr); … samabhājana … (csp1ed) | bahuvidhavijjāvanta → … vijjādhara (mr) | naraciranisevitaṃ → naravīra … (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
